title: What was the year-over-year percentage change in Deferred revenue for FY 2022 to FY 2023 for Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL)? Using Appleâ€™s Form 10-K, express your answer as a % rounded to 2 decimal places.
description:
1. The first step is to determine deferred Revenue for FY 2023 = $8,061M as listed in the consolidated balance sheet.
 
 2. Next up, we need to find deferred Revenue for FY 2022 = $7,912M as shown in the consolidated balance sheet.
 
 3. Now, calculate year-over-year change from FY 2022 to FY 2023 = ($8,061M - $7,912M) / $7,912M = $149M/$7,912M = 1.88%
